mapper.insert: insert into admin_inquire values(seq_admin_inquire_no.nextval, #{inquireNo}, #{adminId}, #{adminName}, #{content}, default, default)
mapper.update: update report_user set condition = #{condition} where no = #{no}
update report_board set condition = #{condition} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select i.*, (select condition from admin_inquire where inquire_no = i.no) condition from inquire i order by no desc
select * from report_user order by no desc
select r.*, b.board_name from report_board r left join board_id b on r.board_id = b.board_id order by no desc
mapper.update: update member set enabled = 0 where id = #{reportee}
mapper.select: select * from member m left join authority a on m.id = a.member_id
mapper.update: update community set delete_yn = 'Y' where community_no = #{boardNo}
update used_board set delete_yn = 'Y' where used_board_no = #{boardNo}
update request_board set delete_yn = 'Y' where request_board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from authority where member_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from authority where member_id = #{userId} and authority = 'ROLE_ADMIN'
mapper.select: select extract(month from m.enroll_date) as md ,count(*) from member m where extract(month from m.enroll_date) is not null group by extract(month from m.enroll_date) order by extract(month from m.enroll_date) asc
select * from (select extract(day from enroll_date) as md,count(*) from member where extract(month from enroll_date) = #{month} group by extract(day from enroll_date)) order by md asc
select extract(month from ch.charge_date) as month, round(avg(charge_cash),0) as cash from charge_history ch group by extract(month from ch.charge_date)
